name: A Quiet Realm
description:
This game was made during Ludum Dare 45 within 48 hours. I took part in the compo modus, which means everything needs to be done by one person, including graphics and sounds. I hope you will have as much fun playing this game as I had making it.

It is a game about exploration. Do not worry, you do not have to visit every planet. There won't be a surprise ending. Try to get a good score. ;)

Story-Teaser
You might have messed up someone's favorite place. Let's clean up this ... mess?

Controls
'WASD' or the arrow keys to move and 'E'. No additional keys needed.
Use the mouse in the menu to start the game. The mouse is not needed otherwise. ;-)
